  mutate(beneficiary_type = recode(beneficiary_type, 
                                   "host_community" = "Vulnerable Residents", 
                                   "cwd" = "Persons with Disabilities", 
                                   "idps" = "IDPs", 
                                   "refugees" = "Refugees"))
